abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland", "TaxonKey is Harmonia axyridis (Pallas, 1773)" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Species found in the NOMS estate 2005 - Present 1 records from Data from Defra Family Organisations supplied to Staffordshire Ecological Record 1 records from NRW Regional Data: South East Wales Non-sensitive species 1 records from Derek Lott Coleoptera Dataset 1 records from National Trust for Scotland Species Records 1 records from Norfolk and Suffolk Broads Invertebrate Data 2007-2008 1 records from Montgomeryshire Wildlife Trust records held by BIS 1 records from BioFokus 1 records from Tullie House Museum Natural History Collections 1 records from Nottingham Urban Wildlife Scheme iRecord download 2014 - 2017 1 records from Miscellaneous records held on the Cofnod database 1 records from Leicestershire & Rutland Coleoptera 1 records from MoJ BioBlitz August 2018 1 records from MoJ BioBlitz April - May 2017 2 records from Patrick Roperâ€™s Notebooks 2 records from Woodmeadow Invertebrate Survey 2016 2 records from National Invasive Species Database 2 records from Records from the RHS insect reference collection 3 records from NRW Regional Data: North Wales 3 records from Invertebrate records from sites that are mainly across Scotland 3 records from Manx Biological Recording Partnership UNVERIFIED Isle of Man records between 14/02/2017 and 05/09/2019 3 records from Woodmeadow Invertebrate Survey 2014 3 records from Argyll Biological Records Dataset 3 records from Yorkshire Wildlife Trust - Non-sensitive records from all taxonomic groups 3 records from naturgucker 4 records from Woodmeadow Invertebrate Survey 2017 4 records from Manx Biological Recording Partnership VERIFIED Isle of Man records between 14/02/2017 and 05/09/2019 5 records from SER Site-based Surveys 5 records from Earth Guardians Weekly Feed 7 records from Staffordshire Wildlife Trust Nature Reserves Inventory 8 records from Sheffield and Rotherham Wildlife Trust - Records 8 records from Isle of Man wildlife records from 01/01/2000 to 13/02/2017 10 records from Woodmeadow Invertebrate Survey 2018 10 records from Cumbria Non Native Invasive Species 12 records from SEWBReC Beetles (South East Wales) 16 records from Welsh Invertebrate Database (WID) 16 records from HBRG Insects Dataset 17 records from SER Species-based Surveys 19 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 21 records from RHS monitoring of native and naturalised plants and animals at its gardens and surrounding areas 22 records from Miscellaneous records held by BIS 24 records from iRecord Surveys 25 records from Invertebrate Common Standards Monitoring and ISIS Test Data 34 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 36 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 50 records from NBIS Records to December 2016 71 records from Rotherham Biological Records Centre - Non-sensitive Records from all taxonomic groups 76 records from Records of Invasive Non Native Species held on the Cofnod database 100 records from INNS Data: All Taxa (West Wales) 106 records from Merseyside BioBank Active Naturalists (unverified) 120 records from Merseyside BioBank Active Naturalists (verified) 131 records from BRERC species records from all years at full resolution excluding Notable Species within the last 10 years 139 records from Merseyside BioBank (verified) 201 records from National Trust Species Records 208 records from INNS records held by BIS in Powys and Brecon Beacons National Park 248 records from Coleoptera: Records for Kent 306 records from Merseyside BioBank (unverified) 398 records from BRERC Notable Species records within the last 10 years 400 records from Steve Lane - Warwickshire dataset and Personal records from various vice-counties 402 records from Shropshire Ecological Data Network database 418 records from North Merseyside Local Species Data (DEFRA Grant 23169) 530 records from LERN Records 536 records from An 'as-complete-as-possible' Sussex Beetle Records dataset covering the period to March 2017 601 records from Suffolk Biodiversity Information Service (SBIS) Dataset 692 records from RECORD Coccinellidae Data 711 records from INNS Data: All Taxa (South East Wales) 1292 records from All taxa records for Leicestershire and Rutland 4192 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 25365 records from Ladybird Survey of the UK 33642 records from UK Ladybird Survey data from iRecord
